commit.message:
combine.c (try_combine): When swapping i2 and i3...

	* combine.c (try_combine): When swapping i2 and i3, newi2pat may be
	a PARALLEL instead of a SET due to added clobbers.

From-SVN: r87255

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+
+	* combine.c (try_combine): When swapping i2 and i3, newi2pat may be
+	a PARALLEL instead of a SET due to added clobbers.
